Notre Dame Of Holy Cross School,
Udayapatti, Salem - 140.

Student Facility

Life is for Service. Our Reputation goes by It.

Pinaacle Classes

The School has tied up with a recongnised institute - Pinaacle Coaching Institute in order to train pupils for IIT/JEE or NEET entrance exams. A section of class is segregated for the pinaacle students wherein expertised teachers teach beyond NCERT syllabus.

Transportation

Transport system by bus is provided to the students. They support upto 60 students per bus. Buses have GPS and Bus Governer Installed for better and safer transport experience.

Library

Library is provisioned to serve simply more knowledge to students. Students can access the library and undertake a certain number of books at a time. Curricular Guides, Facts, Dictionaries, Novels, Comics, Biographies etc. would be available at pupil's fingertips.

SmartBoards

Smart boards or smart classrooms are installed so that students get a visual idea of what's being taught. Selective videos and demonstrations are played to the students in Smartboards.

Playground

Considering physical health Physical Exercise periods exist during which pupils can play in the spacious playground. Students can also join any of the teams if they excel at - Basketball, Volleyball, Football, Cricket and Kho-Kho. On their own interest, they can sign up for evening coaching classes.

Auditorium

We have a spacious aditorium that could hold more than two thousand people. Weekly gatherings and festive celeberations are held in the auditorium.

Laboratories

Students are taken to Science(Phy, Chem, Bio) Laboratories to do or witness experiments. Students can also undertake things that are available in the laboratory and return it after use.

Gratifying Restrooms

We always try to give people more than what they expect us to give.
